short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rename element in editor by clicking - from labastide.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly streamline your workflow in Bubble with this powerful naming tool! Save valuable time by automatically renaming elements in your projects based on your personalized naming conventions.

Simply configure your preferred names for various elements like inputs, dropdowns, multiline inputs, and more (defaults include INP for inputs, DD for dropdowns, DTP for date/time pickers, etc.). Once set, renaming becomes a breeze—just click on the element name in the element tree, and it’s done!

This extension ensures consistency in your projects by applying your custom naming convention every single time. Say goodbye to repetitive renaming and hello to a faster, more organized workflow!
